channel.title: Quitting moparscape! {fuckers}
channel.description:
Yeah im tired of fucking reading every thread and see haters & dumb asses say *LEECH* or "Use the search bar", or smart ass comments such as "your dumb", "learn to code", "who needs your help when people already know this". I mean come on Moparscape. I thought this was a helping community not a fucking lunatic & hater community. So you know what for all the people who are ass holes out there make sure you bring in more and shut this site down. It's so fucking ridiculous. This site must of been helpful at one point until dumb asses learned how to code and started to fucking be dicks on this site. I don't even fucking care if you ban me right now because once the *GOOD* people read this they will also agree. Take a good look around you! People with usually 200 reputation points are usually the dicks. Go look up in the threads to see how many rude, and non-helpful comments there are from people. So far I've actually found over 100.
I will start my own fucking helpful community, and sure as hell won't be as rude as this one. Matter of fact it will be 200 times better then this one because I will be actually watching the fucking forums, and banning all the dicks, and non helpful people on there.
OR
If moparscape decides to clean up their act and start banning all the dicks, and non-helpful people then I will gladly stay on here. Even if you ban me I will make another account and keep watching the forums. All I got to say Moparscape get fucking better moderators. Ban all the asshole moderators and get new ones that will actually help out the community not fucking do nothing about it.

lol the irony of the title and post made me giggle

anywho, read the section rules please
